param.name: css.processor.path.prince
param.desc: Path to the Prince executable file (eg: "c:\path\to\prince.exe" on Windows) which should be run to produce the PDF

param.name: css.processor.path.antenna-house
param.desc: Path to the Antenna House executable file (eg: "c:\path\to\AHFCmd.exe" on Windows) which should be run to produce the PDF

param.name: dita.css.list
param.desc: You can use this to specify a list of CSS URLs to be used by the PDF processor. The files must be have URL syntax and be separated using semicolon. If the value is empty, then are used the DITA topics/maps CSS files (the current selection from the oXygen [Styles] dropdown).

param.name: args.css
param.desc: You can use this to specify a list of CSS URLs to be used in addition to the dita.css.list parameter. The files must have URL syntax and be separated using a semicolon. The dita.css.list parameter may be left empty if the current selection from the oXygen [Styles] dropdown is to be used.

param.name: show.changes.and.comments
param.desc: When set on 'yes', the user comments, colored highlights and trackchanges are shown in the output.
